mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Truth and Reason"; 02 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 35 (back of added page); "Truth and Reason"; States that a man who chooses to be clergy should not be ashamed, as it is an essential position. Society is educated enough to be versed in the "truth" of modern scientific knowledge, including evolution--but this will not necessarily negatively impact spiritual beliefs. "Religious experience" is said to be a "normal and healthy activity of the human mind" and thus, is not in danger.; by Dean Inge, Daily Dispatch; DF 654
